meanings.definition: A person in charge of a division of a university or college.
meanings.sent1: The deans oversee different departments at the university.
meanings.sent2: The deans meet regularly to discuss academic matters.
meanings.sent3: When the deans organized a surprise party, everyone was thrilled.
meanings.sent4: The deans are like the captains of their academic ships.
meanings.sent5: The deans guide the educational journey of students.

meanings.definition: The head of a chapter of a cathedral or collegiate church.
meanings.sent1: The deans of the cathedral lead the religious services.
meanings.sent2: The deans ensure the church events run smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The deans joked about having a race up the cathedral stairs.
meanings.sent4: The deans stand tall like the spires of the cathedral.
meanings.sent5: The deans' presence fills the cathedral with reverence.

meanings.definition: A member of the clergy in charge of a group of parishes.
meanings.sent1: The deans provide spiritual guidance to the parishioners.
meanings.sent2: The deans visit different parishes to offer support.
meanings.sent3: The deans organized a picnic for all the parish members.
meanings.sent4: The deans' words are like a beacon of hope in the parishes.
meanings.sent5: The deans nurture the faith of the parish community.
